backend/main.mo: Motoko canister for managing shipments, supporting creation, event updates, and retrieval of shipment snapshots.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing maintenance-mode features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page that mounts the React app and loads the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping them in ThemeProvider and SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/ContactDetailsCa: Displays company contact information and business hours using card components and icons.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop and mobile menus, theme-aware elements, and Get Quote button.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Standalone full-screen message indicating the site is offline or unpublished.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryS: Renders a titled service category section with icon and a grid of service cards.
frontend/src/components/ServicePreviewGr: Shows a four-card grid preview of key service offerings such as air, ocean, road, and warehousing.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the website footer with company info, quick links, services, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StatsStrip.tsx: Displays a grid of key company statistics with icons.
frontend/src/entry.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, maintenance mode, identity provider, and query client.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the userâ€™s Internet Identity, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no dynamic backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useShipmentTracking.t: Fetches shipment details for a tracking number using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/contactValidation.ts: Validates contact form fields and returns structured error messages.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into human-readable date strings.
frontend/src/lib/maintenanceMode.ts: Exports a flag that toggles global maintenance mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Standard app bootstrap rendering App with query client and identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, values, stats, and imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with validation, submission simulation, and a details section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with a hero banner, highlights, and links to services and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays categorized logistics services with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/TrackingPage.tsx: Shipment tracking page showing a disabled 'coming soon' form.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site structure, known issues, and architectural notes.
